description:
Learn how to create a professionanol resume that will grab an employer's attention.

Become a Professional Resume Writer with this Comprehensive Course.

Confidently apply to job listings and opportunities.

Understand the purpose and use of a resume.

Learn resume writing dos and don'ts.

Learn key terms used in a professional resume.

Successfully create a resume on your own.

The Easy step by step guide you were awaiting.

Possessing professional resume writing skills will assist you in beating the competition in today's competitive job market. Highlighting your skills, professional experience and educational achievements is key to obtaining the career or entry level position you desire.

Whether you are seeking a new job, are re-entering the work force or pursuing a career change; possessing professional resume writing skills ensures that you will position yourself as an expert who can effectively deliver.

This course was created and designed to eliminate the dependency upon others to create a resume on your behalf that does not produce your desired results. The key purpose of this course is to teach you resume writing fundamentals that will supply you with clear and concise steps to creating your perfect resume.

In efforts to ensure you do not become frustrated, Sequoya Moe-Willis created 35 lectures in video format equaling to an hour's worth of video content. Each lecture details step by step approaches to creating your resume and has 19 activities that will ensure you remain on track as you navigate through each resume writing step

A workbook was included in the course to serve as your resume writing road map. After completing each step in the workbook, you'll be able to easily transfer the information from the workbook onto your resume. Five additional outside resources were included as reading assignments to enhance your understanding.

There are 10 sections of content in this course. Sequoya teaches you the difference between an objective and professional profile; where and how to list your educational and professional experience; the importance of listing your skill sets and more.

As an added bonus to the course, you'll be able to download a complimentary cover letter and reference list template. Upon completing the course, you'll have a fully created resume that you can submit for job postings and career opportunities.
title: How to Create a Resume the Easy Way: So Easy a Kid can do it
